tourists.name: Eiffel Tower
tourists.description: An iconic symbol of France, offering stunning views of Paris from its observation decks.

tourists.name: Great Wall of China
tourists.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, this ancient wall stretches over 13,000 miles and offers breathtaking views and historical significance.

tourists.name: Machu Picchu
tourists.description: An ancient Incan city set high in the Andes Mountains, known for its archaeological significance and stunning scenery.

tourists.name: Colosseum
tourists.description: An ancient amphitheater in the heart of Rome, known for its history and architectural grandeur.

tourists.name: Statue of Liberty
tourists.description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, this colossal statue is located on Liberty Island in New York Harbor.

tourists.name: Taj Mahal
tourists.description: A stunning white marble mausoleum, built by Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.

tourists.name: Santorini
tourists.description: Known for its beautiful sunsets, white-washed buildings, and blue-domed churches, Santorini is a top Mediterranean destination.

tourists.name: Sydney Opera House
tourists.description: An architectural masterpiece and a UNESCO World Heritage site, known for its unique design and cultural performances.

tourists.name: Christ the Redeemer
tourists.description: A massive statue of Jesus Christ that overlooks the city of Rio de Janeiro, offering panoramic views.

tourists.name: Petra
tourists.description: An ancient city carved into red sandstone cliffs, known for its archaeological and historical significance.
